title: Aaron Rodgers Speaks & Where will Matthew Stafford end up?
itunes:title: Aaron Rodgers Speaks & Where will Matthew Stafford end up?
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal bring you all of the latest news in the NFL starting with the Eagles hiring their new head coach (3:29), Aaron Rodgers speaking out on his career (9:15), and the speculation on whether Jared Goff will still be a Ram (16:26). Kevin Patra, long time Lions fan, joins the show to discuss the new hire and Stafford's potential departure (22:59).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
